body:
Facile is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning courses, follow along fitness workouts, coding tutorials and more – on thousands of internet-connected devices.

You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want, without a single advert – all for one low monthly price. There's always something new to learn, and new courses and workouts are added every week!
Watch Facile on your smartphone, tablet, smart TV, laptop or streaming device, all for one low fixed monthly fee. Plans start from $10.99 a month. No extra costs or contracts.

Watch anywhere, anytime, on an unlimited number of devices. Sign in with your Facile account to watch instantly on the web at facile.com from your personal computer or on any internet-connected device, including smart TVs, smartphones, tablets, streaming media players and game consoles.

It is PWA compatible,  so you can watch your favourite programmes with iOS, Android, or Windows 10 without any additional downloads. Take Facile with you anywhere.

Facile is flexible. There are no annoying contracts and no commitments. You can easily cancel your account online in two clicks. There are no cancellation fees – start or stop your account at any time.

header: What can I watch on Facile?
body: Facile has an extensive library of coding tutorials, workout documentaries, follow-along fitness programmes, and more. Watch as much as you want, any time you want.
